qas.question: When did Harper Lee pass away?
What is the only other work Harper Lee published?
What is the name of Lee's second published work?
When was the second book published?

context: To Kill a Mockingbird was Lee's only published book until <a1_0><a2_0>Go Set a Watchman<a2_0/><a1_0/>, an earlier draft of To Kill a Mockingbird, was published on <a3_0>July 14, 2015<a3_0/>. Lee continued to respond to her work's impact until her death in <a0_0><a4_0>February 2016<a4_0/><a0_0/>, although she had refused any personal publicity for herself or the novel since 1964.
